name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover.Over.isOver_map
initialProofState:
S : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
P : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
X : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
instâœ : X.Over S
ğ’° : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover P X
self : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover.Over S ğ’°
j : ğ’°.J
âŠ¢ AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.IsOver (ğ’°.map j) S
decl:
/-- A `P`-cover of a scheme `X` over `S` is a cover, where the components are over `S` and the
component maps commute with the structure morphisms. -/
protected class Cover.Over {P : MorphismProperty Scheme.{u}} {X : Scheme.{u}} [X.Over S]
    (ğ’° : X.Cover P) where
  over (j : ğ’°.J) : (ğ’°.obj j).Over S := by infer_instance
  isOver_map (j : ğ’°.J) : (ğ’°.map j).IsOver S := by infer_instance

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover.pullbackCoverOver_map
initialProofState:
P : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
S : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
instâœâµ : P.IsStableUnderBaseChange
instâœâ´ : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.IsJointlySurjectivePreserving P
X W : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
ğ’° : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover P X
f : Quiver.Hom W X
instâœÂ³ : W.Over S
instâœÂ² : X.Over S
instâœÂ¹ : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover.Over S ğ’°
instâœ : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.IsOver f S
x : ğ’°.J
âŠ¢ Eq ((AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover.pullbackCoverOver S ğ’° f).map x) (CategoryTheory.Limits.pullback.fst (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.asOver f S) (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.asOver (ğ’°.map x) S)).left
decl:
/-- The pullback of a cover of `S`-schemes along a morphism of `S`-schemes. This is not
definitionally equal to `AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover.pullbackCover`, as here we take
the pullback in `Over S`, whose underlying scheme is only isomorphic but not equal to the
pullback in `Scheme`. -/
@[simps]
def Cover.pullbackCoverOver : W.Cover P where
  J := ğ’°.J
  obj x := (pullback (f.asOver S) ((ğ’°.map x).asOver S)).left
  map x := (pullback.fst (f.asOver S) ((ğ’°.map x).asOver S)).left
  f x := ğ’°.f (f.base x)
  covers x := (mem_range_iff_of_surjective ((ğ’°.pullbackCover f).map (ğ’°.f (f.base x))) _
    ((PreservesPullback.iso (Over.forget S) (f.asOver S) ((ğ’°.map _).asOver S)).inv)
    (PreservesPullback.iso_inv_fst _ _ _) x).mp ((ğ’°.pullbackCover f).covers x)
  map_prop j := by
    dsimp only
    rw [â† Over.forget_map, â† PreservesPullback.iso_hom_fst, P.cancel_left_of_respectsIso]
    exact P.pullback_fst _ _ (ğ’°.map_prop j)

initialProofState:

instâœÂ³ : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.IsOver f S
Q : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme

instâœÂ¹ : Q.IsStableUnderBaseChange
instâœ : Q.IsStableUnderComposition
hX : Q (CategoryTheory.over X S inferInstance)
hW : Q (CategoryTheory.over W S inferInstance)
hQ : âˆ€ (j : ğ’°.J), Q (CategoryTheory.over (ğ’°.obj j) S inferInstance)
x : ğ’°.J
âŠ¢ Eq ((AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover.pullbackCoverOverProp S ğ’° f hX hW hQ).map x) (CategoryTheory.Limits.pullback.fst (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.asOverProp f S) (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.asOverProp (ğ’°.map x) S)).left
decl:
/-- The pullback of a cover of `S`-schemes with `Q` along a morphism of `S`-schemes. This is not
definitionally equal to `AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover.pullbackCover`, as here we take
the pullback in `Q.Over âŠ¤ S`, whose underlying scheme is only isomorphic but not equal to the
pullback in `Scheme`. -/
@[simps (config := .lemmasOnly)]
def Cover.pullbackCoverOverProp : W.Cover P where
  J := ğ’°.J
  obj x := (pullback (f.asOverProp (hX := hW) (hY := hX) S)
    ((ğ’°.map x).asOverProp (hX := hQ x) (hY := hX) S)).left
  map x := (pullback.fst (f.asOverProp S) ((ğ’°.map x).asOverProp S)).left
  f x := ğ’°.f (f.base x)
  covers x := (mem_range_iff_of_surjective ((ğ’°.pullbackCover f).map (ğ’°.f (f.base x))) _
    ((PreservesPullback.iso (MorphismProperty.Over.forget Q _ _ â‹™ Over.forget S)
      (f.asOverProp S) ((ğ’°.map _).asOverProp S)).inv)
    (PreservesPullback.iso_inv_fst _ _ _) x).mp ((ğ’°.pullbackCover f).covers x)
  map_prop j := by
    dsimp only
    rw [â† Over.forget_map, MorphismProperty.Comma.toCommaMorphism_eq_hom,
      â† MorphismProperty.Comma.forget_map, â† Functor.comp_map]
    rw [â† PreservesPullback.iso_hom_fst, P.cancel_left_of_respectsIso]
    exact P.pullback_fst _ _ (ğ’°.map_prop j)

decl:
/-- The pullback of a cover of `S`-schemes with `Q` along a morphism of `S`-schemes. This is not
definitionally equal to `AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Cover.pullbackCover`, as here we take
the pullback in `Q.Over âŠ¤ S`, whose underlying scheme is only isomorphic but not equal to the
pullback in `Scheme`. -/
@[simps (config := .lemmasOnly)]
def Cover.pullbackCoverOverProp : W.Cover P where
  J := ğ’°.J
  obj x := (pullback (f.asOverProp (hX := hW) (hY := hX) S)
    ((ğ’°.map x).asOverProp (hX := hQ x) (hY := hX) S)).left
  map x := (pullback.fst (f.asOverProp S) ((ğ’°.map x).asOverProp S)).left
  f x := ğ’°.f (f.base x)
  covers x := (mem_range_iff_of_surjective ((ğ’°.pullbackCover f).map (ğ’°.f (f.base x))) _
    ((PreservesPullback.iso (MorphismProperty.Over.forget Q _ _ â‹™ Over.forget S)
      (f.asOverProp S) ((ğ’°.map _).asOverProp S)).inv)
    (PreservesPullback.iso_inv_fst _ _ _) x).mp ((ğ’°.pullbackCover f).covers x)
  map_prop j := by
    dsimp only
    rw [â† Over.forget_map, MorphismProperty.Comma.toCommaMorphism_eq_hom,
      â† MorphismProperty.Comma.forget_map, â† Functor.comp_map]
    rw [â† PreservesPullback.iso_hom_fst, P.cancel_left_of_respectsIso]
    exact P.pullback_fst _ _ (ğ’°.map_prop j)
